text:
A woman and a four-year-old boy were killed on the spot after the car they were travelling rammed the median near Andalur Gate on the Salem – Namakkal National Highway here on Monday morning. Vijayabaskar (35), an assistant professor at Madurai Kamaraj University, along with his wife Agilandeswari (34), son Deepan Ranjith (4), and five of his relatives were returning from Tirupathi to their native place in Bodi in Theni district. While nearing Kolinjipatti, their car hit the median and fell into roadside pit.

Their relative Iswarya (32) and Deepan Ranjith died on the spot while the injured were hospitalised. Rasipuram police registered a case.
title: Two killed in road accident
